data.name: DOA5LR Summer Festival Costume Set
data.detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

This is a yukata-themed costume set for the characters of DOA5LR, perfect for one last summer fling! This set includes all 17 of the Summer Festival costumes. - Please note that these costumes do not include destructible functionality. This set contains costumes for the following characters: Kasumi, Ayane, Kokoro, Hitomi, Leifang, Tina, Lisa, Helena, Christie, Mila, Momiji, Rachel, Marie Rose, Phase 4, Nyotengu, Honoka, and Naotora Ii. *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content. *You must purchase the necessary characters before using this content. *The Fireworks stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game.
data.about_the_game:
This is a yukata-themed costume set for the characters of DOA5LR, perfect for one last summer fling!
This set includes all 17 of the Summer Festival costumes.
- Please note that these costumes do not include destructible functionality.
This set contains costumes for the following characters:
Kasumi, Ayane, Kokoro, Hitomi, Leifang, Tina, Lisa, Helena, Christie, Mila, Momiji, Rachel, Marie Rose, Phase 4, Nyotengu, Honoka, and Naotora Ii.

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
*You must purchase the necessary characters before using this content.
*The Fireworks stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game.

This set includes all 17 of the Summer Festival costumes. - Please note that these costumes do not include destructible functionality. *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
